digibluez how the fuck is creating an offline mode "simple in theory"? You do realize the game DOES NOT SAVE ONTO YOUR COMPUTER AT ALL. All the saved towns go straight to the servers. To be able to make a workable offline mode they have to rewrite the code create some other measure to circumvent it. Cracking or modding anything code-wise is much harder than you are assuming.
If people are able to create their own servers for World of Warcraft, then it should be possible for someone to come up with a way for this to work too :)

martinon I think it would be more trouble than it's worth to create a server setup from pirates. Although If they somehow emulate a server system through code like the assassins creed two crack. Then they could program the emulated server to save perhaps. I think that would be the best plan of action. Of course this is just a theory though, we'll have to see what the crack gurus come up with.

Aabir11, this is not a crack or a full offline mode or anything of this nature.

This is some work done pushing efforts to attempt to get offline features in the future.  

READ: To even use this you will need your legit Simcity game and Origin account.  This only takes away the offline prompt and and a little bit more.  You can not use this on a nonlegit copy of the game, nor can you use it to save your game offline.

BTW thank you for your bit of work SIcrift.  I hope in the future the community can help make this game better than EA would ever allow it to be.
